Tap to Enable
Location
DW SDK Ref needs location access enabled to record your drives. Select “Allow” on the next screen.
First, tap Next and then turn on your location by selecting **“While using the app.”**
DW SDK Ref needs location access set to **“Allow all the time”** so it can automatically record your drives.
Please tap Next to be taken to Settings.
To record trips, DW SDK Ref needs location access both while using the app and when the app is in the background. Without location set to **“Allow all the time”**, DW SDK Ref will not work.
For DW SDK Ref to record your trips, first tap **“While using the app.”**
For DW SDK Ref to record your trips, tap **“Change to precise location.”**
Activity
Activity data is needed to accurately detect that you are moving in a vehicle.
To record your drives, select **“Allow”** on the next screen.
Bluetooth
DW SDK Ref needs access to Bluetooth so it can communicate with the Tag to record your trips. Select “Allow” on the next screen.
Turn off Optimize Battery
To record trips, DW SDK Ref must not be in battery optimization mode. Select “Allow” on the next screen.
Allow Notifications
DW SDK Ref will send you notifications **when trips are not recording** so you get back on track.
Select **“Allow”** on the next screen to make sure you receive these notifications.
If a prompt does not appear, you can enable notifications in app settings.
